Comments_List: Very great, I've learned a lot.

Professor Zhao is very nice and give me lots of helps. Also, I'd like to thank him for his enthusiasm! It may seem Impossible to think master students who do not have research training before could be alive, alert, awake, and enthusiastic for the master. But, with the instruction of Professor Zhao, I am excited to learn.
I would highly recommend this course to another student. Because you can focus on what you are interested in with the help of excellent professors.
Very useful and helpful research experience!
